description:
Infosys is a global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting. We enable clients in more than 50 countries to navigate their digital transformation. With over three decades of experience in managing the systems and workings of global enterprises, we expertly steer our clients through their digital journey. We do it by enabling the enterprise with an AI-powered core that helps prioritize the execution of change. We also empower the business with agile digital at scale to deliver unprecedented levels of performance and customer delight. Our always-on learning agenda drives their continuous improvement through building and transferring digital skills, expertise, and ideas from our innovation ecosystem.

Visit www.infosys.com to see how Infosys (NYSE: INFY) can help your enterprise navigate your next.

updates.text:
🎥 Relive the excitement of day 1 at #EMEAConfluence2024! 

We delved into AI's transformative potential through insightful talks by guest speakers from art, academia, and industry. 🌐✨ Attendees explored new connections and immersed themselves in cutting-edge tech showcases. 

The day was enriched with a cultural city tour, mask making, and concluded with the vibrant spectacle of the Venetian Carnival. 🎭

Discover more takeaways and video summaries on our live insight snapshot page 👉 https://infy.com/4ew0G9D

#InfosysConfluence #EnterpriseAI #AI

96% of marketing executives are using AI in at least one activity, as per Infosys Knowledge Institute research. Full report: infy.com/3Z9dL3d

For CXOs, VPs, and Directors of IT service firms, this report highlights the critical need to integrate AI strategically across marketing functions to stay competitive. As AI continues to transform marketing, understanding its full potential is crucial for driving future growth.

Infosys Aster | Infosys Cobalt | Infosys Topaz | Infosys Consulting | Infosys BPM | WongDoody | Blue Acorn iCi

Author: Jeff Mosier

Contributors: Anand Bangalore, Phil Benton, Kari Connor, Béatrice Daillant, Rashmi Joshi, Samad Masood, Skyler Mattson, John Premkumar, Renee Quan-Knowles, Balaji Sampath, Bruno Soeiro, David Paul Stocks, Aimee Sutton, Ian Thomas, Emily Wilhoit.

Analysis and production: Kate Bevan, Snehal Bhosale, Dylan Cosper, Pramath Kant, Ph.D., Isaac LaBauve, Pragya Rai

#MarketingInnovation #AIinMarketing #DigitalLeadership #CMOInsights

Prevent escalations with #AI and elevate #customerexperience. Let #generativeAI revolutionize agent training. Infosys is leveraging NVIDIA RIVA and NVIDIA Blueprints with Infosys Cortex to create more realistic and personalized training scenarios, helping agents develop essential skills like emotional intelligence and conflict resolution.
Authored by Samit Sawal, Vishal Manchanda & Anand Santhanam, read on to know how this AI-powered approach can enhance customer satisfaction and drive business success. infy.com/4fww09x

#InfosysTopaz #EnterpriseAI #telco 
Infosys Topaz NVIDIA AI

At day 1 of #EMEAConfluence2024, we explored the transformative world of AI! 💡

The day commenced with in-depth discussions during our analyst and advisor meet, setting the stage for the main event. Our impressive lineup of guest speakers from the worlds of art, academia, and industry, came together to share valuable insights into the present and future of AI. They offered pragmatic lessons in how to manage Enterprise AI transformations effectively, efficiently and responsibly.

Attendees had the opportunity to engage with our innovative tech showcases, including the exciting new Formula E simulator and the groundbreaking FT Money Machine.

We concluded the with cultural experiences and a Gala Dinner, providing guests an opportunity to reflect and connect.

For insights and key takeaways from the sessions, visit our live insight snapshot page 👉 https://infy.com/4ew0G9D

#InfosysConfluence #EnterpriseAI #AI

In his CEO address, Salil Parekh, Infosys CEO and MD, set the tone for the day at #EMEAConfluence2024, separating consumer generative AI from enterprise generative AI, which drives growth and productivity for business. It is here where Infosys’ expertise within client industries helps make AI applicable and effective for the businesses. 

Visit our real time insight snapshot for key takeaways from the session 👉 https://infy.com/4ew0G9D

#InfosysConfluence #EnterpriseAI #AI

Infosys Knowledge Institute today unveiled a global research report titled CMO Radar 2024. The report reveals that most companies have embedded artificial intelligence (AI) in their marketing functions and highlights how CMO’s AI fluency (ability to use AI to solve problems) is driving business value and increasing their influence over corporate decision-making and strategy. Read more: infy.com/3AHzxCP #InfyNews

In this digital age, leveraging AI-powered tools like Microsoft 365 Copilot can drive substantial business growth, but it requires a deep understanding to harness its capabilities truly. 

Infosys Copilot ReadyAssist is your one-stop solution for copilot adoption, guiding you confidently through the digital world.

Find out more about this innovative solution at our upcoming event in Canary Wharf.

➡️Register here – infy.com/3ADHgSl

#ReimaginingWorkplaces #CopilotReadyAssist #DigitalWorkplace #AI #Microsoft365Copilot

Shishank Gupta I Rohit Verma I Sumit Sahota I Rashmi Joshi I Purnima Rajta Dhillon I Karan M. I Sujeet Kumar
AI-fluent CMOs are leveraging AI to enhance business value. Stay tuned for the upcoming launch to discover how!

#InfosysTopaz utilized #AI to modernize a major US insurance company's legacy systems, transforming complex SQL-stored procedures into streamlined Java APIs. This strategic move cut software development effort and accelerated time to market. Explore how we drove this impactful transformation: infy.com/4foBAux

#BeingAIFirst #EnterpriseAI

Imagine living in a region where the lack of water resources has forced entire communities to migrate, resulting in severe developmental stagnation. This is the reality in the tribal areas of Jhabua and Alirajpur, Madhya Pradesh.

Organizations like Shivganga Samagra Gramvikas Parishad (SSGP) are leading the charge for change, aiming to empower 1,300 villages through skill training and education.Their goal: empower 1,300 villages, through skill training and education. #InfosysFoundation joined hands with SSGP, established 900 libraries and skill training facilities, benefiting 7,000 people with entrepreneurial skills.

In a remarkable show of unity, over 15,000 villagers gathered for a rainwater harvesting event to identify their common problems, leading to the training of 210 youth who built 10 check dams. Their efforts transformed the landscape, conserving 150 crore liters of water annually and restoring hope to the community.

The once parched and struggling villages, had access to clean, fresh water. As lakes emerged, the community flourished, and the children thrived. The barren land turned into a verdure landscape, proving that with support, a sustainable future is possible.

#InfosysCSR | #RuralDevelopment | #CommunityWelfare
